dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT xeg.error_log_id, xeg.error_message, xeg.error_location, xeg.program_name, xeg.creation_date FROM apps.xx_com_error_log xeg WHERE xeg.module_name = 'PER' and xeg.creation_date >= nvl(to_date(:RPT_ST_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),sysdate) and xeg.creation_date <= nvl(to_date(:RPT_END_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),sysdate) ORDER BY xeg.error_log_id
